queries.item: CREATE TABLE ?:documents( user_id mediumint(8) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', doc_id mediumint(8) UNSIGNED NOT NULL auto_increment, timestamp int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', name varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', document_description varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', category varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', type char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'P', permission_groups varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', status char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'D', PRIMARY KEY (doc_id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;
